playwright.name: playwright
playwright.installation_command: pip install playwright && playwright install chromium
playwright.description: Native Playwright with manual stealth techniques

playwright_stealth.name: playwright-stealth
playwright_stealth.installation_command: pip install playwright playwright-stealth && playwright install chromium
playwright_stealth.description: Playwright with stealth plugin for enhanced anti-detection

patchright.name: patchright
patchright.installation_command: pip install patchright && patchright install chromium
patchright.description: Patched Playwright fork with built-in stealth capabilities

camoufox.name: camoufox
camoufox.description: Firefox-based stealth browser with Playwright API
